title: 32nd Annual Seaport Tree Lighting
desc: Join us for our 32nd Annual Seaport District Tree Lighting with special guest host? Lauren Scala ?of NBC 4 New York. Focused on community and giving back, the lighting ceremony kicks off the holiday season with a glorious 60 foot tree, live music performances by a cappella group the? Mistletones , gospel youth group ?Livre' , singer-songwriter? Connell Cruise , the? Mariners' Temple Baptist Church ?choir, American Idol winner? Nick Fradiani ?and a special appearance by  Santa .? Special music performances presented by? FiDi Living , a curated web resource serving residents and workers in the Financial District. 5pm ? 8pm ???????? Photos with Santa at Seaport Studios, 19 Fulton Street 5:00pm ?????????????? Mistletones pre show 6:00pm ?????????????? Showtime! The Seaport District supports? #GivingTuesday , a global day of giving observed on the Tuesday following Thanksgiving fueled by the power of social media. To learn more, click? here .
